Keywords: Cosmic , Skrulls , Spy
Real Name: Bartak
Special Powers
REFRACTIVE MATRIX TO NEGATE COSMIC MIGHT: When Silver Surfer hits, after resolutions a hit character can't use Protected: Outwit, PROTECTED: Outwit, or Willpower until your next turn.
SKRULL SPY WITH A FRACTION OF THE SURFER'S MIGHT: Hypersonic Speed, Stealth.
SIPHON OFF THE TRUE SURFER: Incapacitate, Precision Strike. Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks.
Trade Silver Surfer Want Silver Surfer

Comments
May 24, 2021
Goop
If he hits, the target can't use Protected outwit. That seems really good until you realize that the entire Skrull team doesn't have any outwit... or prob... or perplex unless you go way back to the captain marvel gravity feed. Disabling Willpower also isn't what it once was now under the 2021 rules. He's still very good with that 50/50 shape change, stealth and hypersonic though. Takes a hit under new rules but still good.
November 11, 2020
tidge
This figure brings something to the modern set of Skrulls that they've been missing: a reliable means of move+attack that won't simply leave the figure automatically exposed to opponents. As a 70-point flying figure, it can assist with the deployment of allies facing disfavored terrain on maps. Ultimately, I'm not sure that players (with the option) wouldn't ignore this piece to instead add a second FF2020 Super Skrull to a force instead, but this is a solid piece with a very nasty ability to shut down WILLPOWER on opposing targets.
September 18, 2020
GL_Alex
I finally found the dial to make the "Howard the Surfer" mod I wanted to make. The Skrull TA will just be for me like someone being dumbfounded at seeing a little metal coated duck flying around on a metal surfboard.
